component.description: Tooltip goes beyond the legacy html title attribute by providing custom effects, events, html content and advance theme support.
component.attributes:
&output_component_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
showEvent false java.lang.String Event displaying the tooltip. Default is mouseover.
showEffect false java.lang.String fade Effect to be used for displaying. Default is fade.
showDelay false java.lang.Integer 150 Delay time to show tooltip in milliseconds. Default is 150.
hideEvent false java.lang.String Event hiding the tooltip. Default is mouseout.
hideEffect false java.lang.String fade Effect to be used for hiding. Default is fade.
hideDelay false java.lang.Integer 0 Delay time to hide tooltip in milliseconds. Default is 0
for false java.lang.String Id of the component to attach the tooltip.
style false java.lang.String Inline style of the tooltip.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the tooltip.
globalSelector false java.lang.String jquery selector for global tooltip, default is "a,:input,:button".
escape false java.lang.Boolean true Defines whether html would be escaped or not, defaults to true.
trackMouse false java.lang.Boolean false Tooltip position follows pointer on mousemove, default is false
beforeShow false java.lang.String Client side callback to execute before tooltip is shown. Returning false will prevent display.
onHide false java.lang.String Client side callback to execute after tooltip is hidden.
onShow false java.lang.String Client side callback to execute after tooltip is shown.
